objects.name: The TARE key
objects.examine: The key looks like it would fit a standard Yale lock

objects.name: A shovel
objects.examine: It's a fine road workers shovel with a wooden handle and the inscription 'Dave's shovel' engraved in it.

objects.name: A sign
objects.examine: The sign has seen better days but you can make out the text: 'Brown's Farm: 500 yds south'.'
